translations: 写博客 （blog 的过去式和过去分词）
写……博客（blog 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Brendon Lynch, Microsoft's chief privacy officer, blogged "We believe consumers should have more control."
sentences.translation: 微软首席隐私官 Brendon Lynch 在博客中写道：“我们认为消费者应该有更多的控制权。”

sentences.sentence: Redfield blogged a scathing attack on Saturday.
sentences.translation: Redfield在星期六撰博一篇对此事予以严厉抨击。

sentences.sentence: I've blogged on this a couple of times recently.
sentences.translation: 我最近已经就这个问题写了两篇博客。
